title: Pollster Tells GOP Presidential Candidates To Recognize Voter Demographics
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to GOP pollster Whit Ayres about the 2016 Republican presidential field. What will take for the GOP to win the race? Ayres is working with Marco Rubio's presidential campaign.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
